# LibraryPlaylistEntryFilter

**Protocol**

Playlist entry properties your app uses as a filter for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryPlaylistEntryFilter
```

## Instance Properties

- **id**: The unique identifier for the playlist entry.

items.description: The unique identifier for the playlist entry.
items.name: id
